content: maybe bug azure when registering app when registering app azure in period verifying publisher domain  it always error  The server returned unexpected content type header value    after google problem i found solution github repo offical document it says the github page does not support content type  application json  but return mime type application json charset utf 8  the azure doesn t think correct so backend server own yours support custom content type as example code nodejs  just follows  var http   require  http      https   github com MicrosoftDocs azure docs issues 39665 var server   http createServer function request  res    res writeHead 200     Content Type    application json      res write  JSON stringify   associatedApplications      applicationId    replace own id             res end        server listen 80   console log  Server listening     it done beer  References https   github com MicrosoftDocs azure docs issues 39665
